sentences.en: " Not a bit. All you need is a little more ginger.
sentences.cn: “ 一点不糟, 你只要再加一点生气就行了.

sentences.en: common spices such as ginger and cinnamon
Ginger ale with lots of ice for me, thank you.
sentences.cn: 姜汁,多加些冰块, 谢谢.

sentences.en: Ginger shall be hot in the mouth.
sentences.cn: 生姜吃到嘴里总是辣的.

sentences.en: Grate a tablespoonful of fresh ginger into a pan.
sentences.cn: 磨碎一汤匙鲜姜，放入平底锅。

sentences.en: He had short ginger-coloured hair and freckles.
sentences.cn: 他一头姜黄色的短发，脸上有些雀斑。

sentences.en: Her fiance & 1 & sported a neat ginger moustache.
sentences.cn: 她的 未婚夫 留着触目的姜黃色小胡子,修剪得很整齐.

sentences.en: His hair is dark grey with flecks of ginger.
sentences.cn: 他深灰色的头发夹杂着几缕姜黄色。

sentences.en: I live mostly on coffee and ginger ale.
sentences.cn: 我主要喝咖啡和姜汁汽水。

sentences.en: Put the onions and ginger in the oven and let them roast for thirty minutes.
sentences.cn: 将洋葱和姜放进烤箱烘烤30分钟。

sentences.en: Root ginger has been used medicinally for centuries.
sentences.cn: 几百年来姜根一直作为药用。

sentences.en: She was a mature lady with dyed ginger hair and a roguish grin.
sentences.cn: 她是一位成熟的淑女，有一头染成姜黄色的头发和顽皮的笑容。

sentences.en: The plump ginger kitten had settled comfortably in her arms and was purring enthusiastically.
sentences.cn: 胖乎乎的姜黄色小猫惬意地躺在她的怀里，大声地打着呼噜。

sentences.en: There is no ginger in him.

words.tran_cn: 易怒的；姜似的；辛辣的；姜味的

phrases.tran_cn: 姜味较淡的姜汁汽水；姜汁无酒精饮料

trans.tran_en: hair or fur that is ginger is bright orange-brown in colour

trans.tran_cn: 姜，生姜，姜黄色，精力，活力
trans.tran_en: the root of the ginger plant used in cooking as a spice

trans.tran_cn: 用姜给…调味；使某人有活力
